titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, with respect to the configuration of the Middle and Southern Districts of Florida.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 4/25/1988--Introduced. Amends the judicial code to move Collier, Glades, and Hendry Counties from the Southern District of Florida to the Middle District of Florida.
